Text: Quaternary:  The Quaternary Period is divided into two epochs: the Pleistocene (2.588 million years ago to 11.7 thousand years ago) and the Holocene (11.7 thousand years ago to today).
Triplets:<Quaternary
3:
--------------------
Text: Quaternary:  The informal term "Late Quaternary" refers to the past 0.5–1.0 million years.
